text:
NBCUniversal (Bravo & Oxygen network) | New York City, NY | Full-Time, Onsite | http://bravotv.com

Our team supports the digital goals of two major cable television brands. Our audience is massive and we need all the help we can get.

We're looking for front-end experts that can effortlessly build video players and reactive interfaces within the confines of the mobile web.

Email me personally at matt.wood@nbcuni.com
